name: Mr shooter: castle Orc bullet
description:
Being a famous Master spy orc is far from legends – it’s a hard piece of cake (something like the life of super bullet mister).

But one thing is true – you are mr gun with col accuracy in taking aim at the castle orc hustle is necessary for this job. Ability to solve bullet time and bullet direction challenges can also be useful you will became mr.time.

All these things you will find in Mr Shot – a unique shoot castle game that will train your brain! All you need is laser focus and precise aim like John in wick movie to take down a variety of castle orc hustle guys – robbers, zombies,, public enemies and other villains who are not few in the world.
Are you capable of doing this in one bullet time?

Travel to various regions of the castle and be the gentle sniper who shoot sniper bullet and save the world from the hands of criminals.
Be careful at TNT bombs – but they can be also useful in increasing stats.
And remember one thing – whether you’re a puzzler or shooter, this best physics shooter game is easy to learn, easy to play but also is almost impossible to master.

Start your adventure now! Become a Bullet Master

Meet mr castle bullet hero.
After years of training, he became shooting phenomenon – Mr Shot – with tiger instinct and ninja accuracy.
Now he is on the secret mission. He must keep the bad guys and he has only a gun at his disposal.
And he likes his gun. Mutually.
So help him become a legend agent and start your mission now!

What do you find in Mr Shot game?

- Challenging puzzles
- Smart ideas in levels
- Cool looking skins
- Stunning graphics and great sounding
- Rescuing civilians mode
- Unique weapons (like grenade launchers)
- COMING SOON – PvP (Spy vs Spy) mode
- COMING SOON – Battle Royale mode
